name: HoverCar
description:
This is a physics-based hovercar simulator with some fun obstacles!

On the top left, there is a health bar. When sparks come out, you lose health. If you die, you can press "R" to revive yourself.

Check out the options menu to change the car physics. WARNING: If you move pretty much any slider to the max weird stuff happens

The physics and some of the obstacles come from the video, I created the camera script, sounds, menu, options system, health system, and sparks. The explosion is from the Unity Asset Store.

Controls:

W/Up Arrow - Accelerate

S/Down Arrow - Brake when going forward, reverse when not moving

A/Left Arrow - Turn Left

D/Right Arrow - Turn Right

R - Reset your rotation if you are stuck, Make you alive if you die
